contentrichtext.text: '''Happy Valley''' may refer to: {{TOC_right}} ==Australia== * [[Happy Valley, New South Wales]] * [[Happy Valley, Queensland]] * [[Happy Valley, South Australia]] * [[Happy Valley, Western Australia]] (in the Millbrook State Forest) * [[Happy Valley, Victoria]] (in the [[Rural City of Swan Hill]]) * [[Happy Valley, Victoria (Golden Plains)|Happy Valley, Victoria]] (in the [[Shire of Golden Plains]]) * [[Happy Valley Football Club]], South Australia ==Canada== * [[Happy Valley-Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Labrador]] * [[Happy Valley, Greater Sudbury, Ontario]] * [[Happy Valley, King, Ontario]] * [[Happy Valley, British Columbia]], in the Western Communities area of Greater Victoria, British Columbia * [[Happy Valley No. 10, Saskatchewan]], a rural municipality in Saskatchewan ==China (theme parks named Happy Valley)== * [[Happy Valley (amusement parks)]] ** [[Happy Valley Beijing]] ** [[Happy Valley Chengdu]] ** [[Happy Valley Shanghai]] ** [[Happy Valley, Shenzhen]] ** [[Happy Valley, Tianjin]] ** [[Happy Valley, Wuhan]] ==Germany== * [[Ruhr Area]], an ironic nickname used by RAF bomber crews during World War II * Happy Valley was a nickname for [[HoppstÃ¤dten-Weiersbach Airfield|Boehmer Army Airfield]] in Germany. ==Hong Kong== * [[Happy Valley, Hong Kong]] :*[[Happy Valley AA]], an association football team based in Hong Kong == India== * [[Happy Valley, Shillong, Meghalaya]], place in Shillong ==Kenya== * [[Happy Valley, Kenya]] is an unofficial name for parts of Kenya and Uganda ==New Zealand== *[[Happy Valley, Auckland]] is a rural locality is approximately 20 km south east of [[Papakura]]. *[[Happy Valley, Wellington]] is a southern suburb of Wellington. *[[Happy Valley, West Coast]] is located approximately 10 km due east of [[Waimangaroa]] at the headwaters of the [[Waimangaroa River]]. *[[Happy Valley, Southland]] is located seven km due east of [[Tuatapere]] in [[Southland, New Zealand|Southland]]. ==United Kingdom== * [[Happy Valley Park]], [[Coulsdon]], [[London]] * [[Bollington]], [[Cheshire]] (nickname) * [[Happy Valley (garden)]], a garden created by Edwin Harrold in Orkney, Scotland. ==United States== * [[Happy Valley, Alaska]] * [[Happy Valley, Calaveras County, California]] * [[Happy Valley, Plumas County, California]] * Happy Valley School District located in the mountain rural area of Santa Cruz, California * The district around Mission and 1st Street in [[San Francisco]], California was called "Happy Valley" in the 19th century. *[[Happy Valley, Kentucky]] * [[Happy Valley, North Carolina]] * [[Happy Valley, Oregon]] * [[Happy Valley, Tennessee]] * [[Happy Valley, Oak Ridge, Tennessee]], construction camp for the [[K-25]] uranium enrichment facility * [[Happy Valley, Maui, Hawaii]] * [[State College, Pennsylvania]] and its immediate area (nickname) ** [[Pennsylvania State University]], located in State College (nickname often used by U.S. sportscasters) * [[Utah County, Utah]] (nickname) * The [[Pioneer Valley]] area in Massachusetts (nickname) * A geographical area in [[Sequim, Washington]] (nickname) ==Vietnam== * [[Happy Valley, Vietnam]] ==Miscellaneous== * [[Happy Valley (novel)|''Happy Valley'' (novel)]], a 1939 novel by Patrick White * [[The Happy Valley (book)|''The Happy Valley'' (book)]], a 1968 children's book by [[Eric Berne]] * ''[[The Happy Valley]]'', a 1987 TV film set in Kenya in the 1930s * [[Happy Valley AA]], an athletic association and football team in Hong Kong * [[Happy Valley set]], a notorious group of British expatriates in Kenya from the 1920s-1940s * ''Happy Valley'', a composition by Vanessa-Mae from her album ''[[China Girl: The Classical Album 2]]'' {{Disambiguation|geo}}
